rows.label: qst002001_msg001
rows.name: 依頼

rows.label: qst002001_msg002
rows.name: 早く持ってきてほしいも

rows.label: qst002001_msg003
rows.name: どうもありがとう

rows.label: qst002001_msg0001
rows.name: Divine Beast's elbows! What am I to do?

rows.label: qst002001_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, dear me... My dear old girl'll be
spinning in her grave, she will!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0003
rows.name:
Woe is me! Is there not a gallant
youngster somewhere who would help
an old wretch such as me?

rows.label: qst002001_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh! You look like the sort that could
help! Strong of arm!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0005
rows.name:
Could you spare a moment to help an
old man in distress, in the twilight of
his years?

rows.label: qst002001_msg0006
rows.name:
I was robbed... Robbed I tell you! Of
something very precious, by a vile,
slobbering beast of a monster!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0007
rows.name:
I strolled up here, same as I do every
morning... Then something set upon me
from the rear!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0008
rows.name:
It all happened so fast... Couldn't even
clap my eyes on what kind of monster
it was. Or what direction it ran off in.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, it was a dear thing to her. She had
it with her right till the end, she did.
And it's a dear keepsake to me, too.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0010
rows.name:
I'd get it back myself... But these old
bones aren't up to it. Maybe you young
valiants would be able to though?

rows.label: qst002001_msg0011
rows.name:
Oh! You'll get it back for me, will you?
Kind and brave! Thank you!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0012
rows.name:
Like I said before, I've no idea what
monster it was that took it.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0013
rows.name:
Maybe you'll be able to find some
sort of clue if you sniff around there
yourselves.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0014
rows.name: Well, good luck with it!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0101
rows.name:
I was right by the Village Guardian
when I got assaulted. Have a bit of a
look there and you might get lucky.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0103
rows.name:
I was by the steps when it came at me.
I had a look round there meself, but I
couldn't see 'owt.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0102
rows.name:
If you could return it to me, I'd be so
grateful...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0201
rows.name: Managed to find it, did you?

rows.label: qst002001_msg0202
rows.name:
It's a precious memento of my old girl,
this is.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0203
rows.name:
Yes, when she was alive, she always
had this round her neck.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0204
rows.name:
Brings it all back, holding this. I can
smell her breath, like she was licking
my face after chewing on a bone.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0205
rows.name: Let's ask him...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0206
rows.name: Ask him if it was his wife's

rows.label: qst002001_msg0207
rows.name: Ask him if it was his dog's

rows.label: qst002001_msg0208
rows.name: Huh? What are you talking about?

rows.label: qst002001_msg0209
rows.name: This was my dog Sally's collar!

rows.label: qst002001_msg0210
rows.name: Why would my wife wear a dog collar?

rows.label: qst002001_msg0211
rows.name:
Oh, the very thought of it!
You're a strange sort.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0212
rows.name:
Huh?
Now I come to think of it, I didn't make
that clear, did I?

rows.label: qst002001_msg0213
rows.name: My old dog Sally's collar, this was.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0214
rows.name:
Ah, I remember the days when she was
still here, and she'd scamper round the
meadow...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0215
rows.name:
Oh... I got a bit carried away
on the nostalgia train there...

rows.label: qst002001_msg0216
rows.name:
You'll have to forgive me... When you
get to this age, you can't help it.

rows.label: qst002001_msg0217
rows.name:
Well, you've been a tremendous help
to me. Have this for your troubles.
